亚马逊将于 2024 年中期对“根”AWS 账户强制执行 MFA https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/amazon-to-make-mfa-mandatory-for-root-aws-accounts-by-mid-2024/ Thu, 05 Oct 2023 13:06:36 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityCloudTechnology https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/amazon-to-make-mfa-mandatory-for-root-aws-accounts-by-mid-2024/ Amazon will require all privileged AWS (Amazon Web Services) accounts to use multi-factor authentication (MFA) for stronger protection against account hijacks leading to data breaches, starting in mid-2024.
